'''Tiny Miracle's Flower''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Tiny Miracle]].

==Description==
A little blue flower that sprouted between the cracks of an old tombstone.<br />The carvings on the tombstone are a legacy of death, yet what sprouted from its cracks was the miracle of life.
